item.title: 印度中央银行加快海外黄金回流速度
item.description: 印度央行目前在国内持有超过 65% 的黄金储备，比四年前增加了近一倍，在西方国家入侵乌克兰后冻结了俄罗斯的黄金储备之后，印度加快了贵金属的回流。【原文：India’s central bank now holds more than 65% of its gold reserves at home, nearly double the share from four years ago, accelerating the repatriation of the precious metal after Western nations froze Russia’s reserves following the invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 运载俄罗斯原油的印度籍油轮在波罗的海掉头
item.description: 一艘满载俄罗斯原油、驶往印度的油轮调转航向，目前在波罗的海闲置，这表明在美国加强对莫斯科的制裁后，两国之间的石油贸易可能会中断。【原文：An India-bound tanker filled with Russian crude reversed course and is now idling in the Baltic Sea, a sign of potential disruption in oil trade between the two countries after the US tightened sanctions on Moscow.】

item.title: 特朗普燃起中国黑井销售希望，英伟达股价飙升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将与中国领导人习近平讨论芯片制造商 Blackwell 人工智能处理器之后，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s shares extended their dramatic ascent to a record after US President Donald Trump said he’ll discuss the chipmaker’s Blackwell artificial intelligence processors with Chinese leader Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 国内收益率飙升，日本保险公司削减外债
item.description: 国内收益率的上升促使日本一些最大的人寿保险公司增加国内债券持有量，减少海外债务，因为海外收益不再像以前那样可观。【原文：Rising yields at home are prompting some of Japan’s biggest life insurers to boost domestic bond holdings and pare overseas debt, with foreign returns no longer stacking up as they once did.】

item.title: 中国购买本季首批美国大豆
item.description: 中国已经购买了至少两船美国大豆，这是其本季首次购买大豆，这可能标志着作为本周两个最大经济体之间有望达成的更广泛协议的一部分，美国大豆的流动正在恢复。【原文：China has bought at least two cargoes of US soybeans, its first known purchase this season, which may mark a revival of flows as part of a wider settlement expected to be agreed between the two biggest economies this week.】

item.title: 贾戈银行利润飙升，主要得益于利息收入和用户增长
item.description: 印尼数字贷款公司 PT Bank Jago 今年前九个月的利润增长了一倍多，主要原因是应用程序的使用率不断提高，导致利息收入激增。【原文：PT Bank Jago, an Indonesian digital lender, more than doubled profit in the first nine months of the year, driven by a surge in interest income amid growing app usage.】

item.title: 中国混合动力车和电动车销量大增，刷新欧洲汽车销量纪录
item.description: 由于对电池驱动和混合动力电动车型的需求激增，中国汽车制造商 9 月份在欧洲的业绩创下了有史以来最好的一个月，一举超过了此前的最高点。【原文：Chinese carmakers posted their best month ever in Europe, roaring past previous highs in September on surging demand for battery-powered and hybrid-electric models.】

item.title: 荷兰大选将权衡回归中庸之道
item.description: 在近代史上最右翼的政府领导下经历了两年的政治动荡之后，荷兰选民将于周三前往投票站，决定他们是否要开辟一条新的道路。【原文：After two years of political turmoil under the most right-wing administration in recent history, Dutch voters will head to the polls Wednesday to decide if they’ll chart a new path.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯称日本国防开支计划 "精彩纷呈
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和日本首相佐佐江-高市同意深化美日防务关系的第二天，国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯称赞了日本加强军事力量的新决心。【原文：Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth praised Japan’s new resolve to bolster its military a day after President Donald Trump and Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi agreed to deepen US-Japan defense ties.】

item.title: 国债波动之死为鲍威尔带来惊喜埋下伏笔
item.description: 最近几周，全球最大债券市场的波动性已经崩溃，但美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔即将召开的新闻发布会可能会改变这一局面。【原文：Volatility in the world’s largest bond market has collapsed in recent weeks, but Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s upcoming press conference may change the picture.】

item.title: 越南降雨量创历史新高，造成九人死亡，数千人被迫撤离
item.description: 越南中部大范围的洪灾已造成顺化和岘港旅游中心 9 人死亡，10 多万所房屋受损，这个东南亚国家又一次经受了极端天气的考验。【原文：Widespread flooding across central Vietnam has killed nine people and damaged more than 100,000 homes in the tourist hubs of Hue and Da Nang, as the Southeast Asian nation endures another bout of extreme weather.】

item.title: 中国储能政策推动锂价格上涨
item.description: 对大规模电池存储需求的信心不断增强，推动了中国锂价格的上涨。【原文：Chinese lithium prices are getting a boost from growing confidence in demand for large-scale battery storage.】

item.title: 假日汇款即将到达，菲律宾比索有望反弹
item.description: 菲律宾比索有望从历史低点反弹，数百万海外菲律宾人的年终季节性汇款有望提振菲律宾比索。【原文：The Philippine peso looks poised to rebound from its record low, with seasonal year-end remittances from millions of Filipinos abroad expected to give the currency a boost.】

item.title: 分析师称印度央行将恢复债券购买以增加现金流
item.description: 分析师说，随着贷款机构出现流动性紧张的迹象，印度储备银行可能将在明年初恢复债券购买。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India will probably resume bond purchases early next year as signs of liquidity strain emerge among lenders, analysts said.】

item.title: 阳狮集团在社交媒体领域收购新加坡备忘录制作公司
item.description: 广告巨头阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）同意收购新加坡的 Hepmil Media Group，以加强其在东南亚快速增长的网络市场上的社交媒体专长。【原文：Advertising giant Publicis Groupe SA agreed to buy Singapore’s Hepmil Media Group to bolster its social-media expertise in Southeast Asia’s rapidly growing online market.】

item.title: 印度投资者转趋谨慎，上市后大涨已不多见
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美联储决议前基本金属从三年高位回落
item.description: 由于对美联储再次降息的押注不断增加，工业大宗商品的一个关键指标升至近三年半以来的最高点，基本金属在周三的早盘交易中走低。【原文：Base metals edged lower in early trading on Wednesday, after a key gauge of the industrial commodities rose to its highest in almost three-and-a-half years amid growing bets on another Federal Reserve rate cut.】

item.title: 高盛上调明年铁矿石预测，但仍看跌
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）上调了 2026 年的铁矿石价格预期，原因是宏观经济的支持、库存收紧以及中国钢铁生产的恢复性增长，但仍预计明年铁矿石价格将下跌。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised its iron ore price forecast for 2026 on macroeconomic support, tighter inventories and resilient Chinese steel production, but is still expecting prices to drop next year.】

item.title: 亚马逊将向韩国数据中心再投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）将再拨出 50 亿美元用于投资韩国的数据中心，大幅提高其在韩国建设人工智能基础设施的投入。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is setting aside another $5 billion for investment in South Korean data centers, sharply ramping up the spending it’s already devoting toward building AI infrastructure in the country.】

item.title: 特朗普期待降低芬太尼关税，英伟达与习近平会谈
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他希望降低美国因芬太尼危机而对中国商品征收的关税，并与中国习近平就英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的旗舰产品Blackwell人工智能芯片进行会谈，世界最大经济体的领导人将在周四的会议上寻求缓解紧张局势。【原文：Donald Trump said he expects to lower tariffs the US has imposed on Chinese goods over the fentanyl crisis and speak with China’s Xi Jinping about Nvidia Corp.’s flagship Blackwell artificial intelligence chip, as leaders of the world’s biggest economies seek to ease tensions in a meeting on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金警告：中国推动人工智能威胁美国经济反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一的投资总监表示，来自中国的廉价人工智能工具有可能引发押注于生成式人工智能的美国科技巨头突然抛售。【原文：Cheaper artificial intelligence tools from China threaten to trigger a sudden sell-off in US tech giants betting on generative AI, according to the investment chief at one of Australia’s largest pension funds.】

item.title: 新的美国投资计划出台后，软银和松下股价攀升
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp.）、松下控股（Panasonic Holdings）和日立制作所（Hitachi Ltd.）在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）访问东京期间被列入有意在美国启动项目的公司名单后，周三股价表现出色。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp., Panasonic Holdings and Hitachi Ltd. shares outperformed Wednesday after they were listed among companies interested in launching projects in the US during President Donald Trump’s visit to Tokyo.】

item.title: 慧科创始人怀特的关键人物风险估计为 60 亿美元
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd.据晨星公司（Morningstar Inc）称，董事长兼创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）的股票交易正受到证券监管机构的调查，他对公司业务的重要性不言而喻，他的离开可能会使公司价值减少多达 93 亿澳元（61 亿美元）。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. Chairman and founder Richard White, whose share trading is being investigated by the securities regulator, is so integral to the business that his departure could wipe as much as A$9.3 billion ($6.1 billion) off the company’s value, according to Morningstar Inc.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀飙升促使澳大利亚央行延长暂停期
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的核心通胀率超预期加速上升，使储备银行进一步放松政策的道路变得更加复杂，并促使货币市场削减了对近期降息的押注。【原文：Australia’s core inflation accelerated beyond expectations last quarter, complicating the Reserve Bank’s path to further policy easing and prompting money markets to slash bets on a near-term interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 彭博经济学》称，特朗普几乎没有为东盟提供救济
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与东南亚国家联盟（Association of Southeast Asian Nations）成员国达成的最新贸易协议有可能使这些国家得到的回报少于华盛顿得到的回报。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s latest trade deals with members of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations risks seeing them receive less than Washington gets in return, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 加拿大重建亚洲贸易关系以应对特朗普关税之痛
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大开征的最新一轮关税，正值马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）开始执行使加拿大免受贸易战影响的任务之际。【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff salvo against Canada landed just as Mark Carney was setting out on a mission to insulate his country from the fallout of the trade war.】

item.title: 贝森特呼吁日本给予日本央行抗击通胀的空间
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）呼吁日本新政府给予日本中央银行对抗通货膨胀的空间；这与他在国内向美联储发出的信息形成了鲜明对比。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called on Japan’s new government to give the nation’s central bank the space to combat inflation — marking a stark contrast with his message at home for the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 黄金连跌三日后企稳，贸易希望抑制避险需求
item.description: 中美贸易有望取得突破，市场对风险资产的偏好增强，黄金在连续三日下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after a three-day rout as appetite for riskier assets strengthened on hopes of a US-China trade breakthrough.】

item.title: Cruise 创始人凯尔-沃格特的机器人初创公司希望获得 40 亿美元估值
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，致力于开发能为人类做家务的机器人的初创公司 The Bot Company 将在一轮融资中筹集 2.5 亿美元，该公司的估值将超过 40 亿美元。【原文：The Bot Company, a startup working on robots that can do chores for people, is set to raise $250 million in a funding round that will value the company at more than $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯和库存问题，石油在连续三天下跌后保持稳定
item.description: 由于投资者评估了西方对俄罗斯主要原油生产商的制裁所产生的影响，以及业界对美国库存变化喜忧参半的估计，石油维持了连续三天的跌势。【原文：Oil held a three-day drop as investors assessed the impact of Western sanctions against leading Russian crude producers alongside a mixed industry estimate of US inventory changes.】
